name: Don't Worry for Being Alone 4th (DWfBA 4th)
description:
This is the fourth photo of a photo series called “Don’t Worry for Being Alone”.

It is a visualization of the same title song from “The Milo”, an alternative band from Bandung. When I took this photo in  Performance Art, Gudang Sarinah, I just could feel the loneliness through the song.

I put a part of the lyric so that we could feel what loneliness is. Enjoy :) 

“Lights guide you through the emptiness
There's something you could found
In the dark”
